name: Dice World
description:
There lived a demon who liked to make toys out of people's souls. One day, while the girl went to the forest to pick berries, the devil kidnapped all the villagers. The girl was scared, but she mustered up the courage and went to the devil to save the villagers. The devil who likes to play pranks offers a game to grant the girl's wish if she wins the game...

Gather characters and use powerful skills to defeat enemies with the girl!

features

  • Create your own party by combining skills with Character
  • Collect relics and enhance your skills to create a stronger party
  • More than 15 unique characters
  • Over 30 powerful relics
  • Over 100 different skills
